thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 16 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Redhill Biopharma Announces Final Results From Phase II Study With Bekinda For IBS-D

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Redhill Biopharma Announces Final Results From Phase II Study With Bekinda For IBS-D
text:
Jan 16 (Reuters) - Redhill Biopharma Ltd:
* REDHILL BIOPHARMA ANNOUNCES FINAL RESULTS FROM PHASE II STUDY WITH BEKINDAÂ® FOR IBS-D
* REDHILL BIOPHARMA - INDEPENDENT REVIEW & ANALYSIS OF FINAL RESULTS CONFIRMED THAT PHASE II STUDY WITH BEKINDA 12 MG SUCCESSFULLY MET PRIMARY ENDPOINT
* REDHILL BIOPHARMA - PLANS TO MEET WITH FDA IN H1 2018 TO DISCUSS DESIGN FOR ONE OR TWO PIVOTAL PHASE III STUDIES WITH BEKINDA 12 MG FOR IBS-D Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
